subject: Subject: Broken gas pedal wire
description_text:
*Subject:* Broken gas pedal wire

Hello,

The wire connecting the gas pedal snapped, and I was wondering if I can
just buy a replacement wire or if I need a whole new gas pedal

Thanks,

conversations.body_text: Hi Stewart Mans,  Please provide your address, contact name, phone number, and order number. We’ll send you a new throttle sensor free of charge.

- Thomas Stewart
   - 10 kirk court
   golden lake, Ontario K0J 1X0
   - Canada
   -
   Order number
   702-6354999-4382633
   - 3433698179


On Thu, 9 Oct 2025 at 21:12, service@simsonn.com
Hi Stewart Mans,  Here is the tracking number : YT2528400702220584. You can track it via https://www.yunexpress.com/.
